New Records: Liam Livingstone scored the fastest half-century in ODIs
Liam Livingstone scored his maiden ODI century
Key Match Events: England won the match by 5 wickets
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and will field
West Indies XI and England XI were announced
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Hope described his hundred as 'irrelevant' if it doesn't contribute to wins
Liam Livingstone felt he was back to his best at the end of summer and praised his side and Sam Curran
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is level at 1-1 with a decider in Barbados coming up on Wednesday
The match was affected by heavy outfield and an up-and-down surface
